subject: Baseball

Deaths (Obituaries)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mr. Nuxhall started pitching for the 1944 Reds at 15 and went on to spend more than half a century with Cincinnati as a pitcher and broadcaster.
snippet: Mr. Nuxhall started pitching for the 1944 Reds at 15 and went on to spend more than half a century with Cincinnati as a pitcher and broadcaster.
